# Welcome to my website

I am a [professor of Health Systems Engineering](https://people.utwente.nl/m.c.mikkers) at [the section Health Technology & Services Research (HTSR)](https://www.utwente.nl/en/bms/htsr/) of [the faculty Behavioural, Management and Social Sciences (BMS)](https://www.utwente.nl/en/bms/) at [the University of Twente](https://www.utwente.nl/en/).

Please feel free to [contact me](mailto:m.c.mikkers@utwente.nl) if you have any questions or would like to discuss potential projects.
